# f5distributedcloud_network_policy (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_network_policy` data source retrieves information about an existing network policy.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_network_policy" "example" {
  name      = "my-network-policy"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "policy_type" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_network_policy.example.policy_type
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the network policy to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the network policy is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the network policy.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the network policy.
- `policy_type` (String) Type of network policy.
